Articles.Content:
Does anyone know if the creator of this is still around somewhere?

If not, does anyone happen to remember the licence it was released under?

I'm quite fond of this one, and I just spent a good two hours rebuilding the configs and fire structures to be compatible with .20 and reducing the mod's consumption by 25%.

If at all possible, I'd like to be able to push it back out to everyone else who wants it as well.

Regardless of memory the license isn't posted anywhere anymore, if it was to begin with. At this point the only person with the right to do anything with those models and textures is the maker, William bunch'o'numbers or something. I haven't looked for him in a while but last i did he hadn't been active since before the forum crash. As a fellow fan of the OI capsules and faced with the mandatory discontinuation of them (until he shows up again or 2130 or so) I went and made my own, being sure the license was shipped with every download. I cant provide a link because Im on a phone right now and thumbing this up is hard enough, but you'll find it on SpacePort if you search for HexCans
